Texts.Chs: ^orange;维纳利斯^reset;刚告诉我他经营的地方。这处^orange;科学前哨站^reset;听起来值得一逛。我已经在^green;飞船的SAIL^reset;里标记了位置，之后我就可以传送到那里。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Vinalisj^reset; has just informed me of a place he operates. This ^orange;Science Outpost^reset; sounds worth visiting. I've marked the location ^green;in my ships SAIL^reset; so I can teleport there.
